name: material-symbols-class
description: material-symbols implementation to use them with classes
author: Joel Corrales <joel.corrales@super7ui.com>

scripts.build:all: npm run copy:fonts && npm run build:css && npm run build:css:min
scripts.build:css:min: sass --style compressed --no-source-map --no-error-css material-symbols.scss:material-symbols.min.css outlined.scss:outlined.min.css rounded.scss:rounded.min.css sharp.scss:sharp.min.css utils.scss:utils.min.css index.scss:index.min.css
